|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM3380Z;BCM3380ZKFSBG; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS |cpu1_type_rev = BMIPS4350 |cpu1spd = <!-- 333 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L12845EMI-10G; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Samsung;; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Broadcom;BCM53114;BCM53114KFBG; |cm_down_c = 8 |cm_up_c = 4 |docsisver = v3.0 |voip_ports = |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = A4:17:31 |oui = A4:17:31
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->

|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = DOCSIS 3.0, |addchip = 2A, 340KHz Adjustable Step-Down Synchronous Rectified DC-DC Converter;Monolithic Power Systems (MPS);MP1482DS;;2; |802dot11_protocols = abgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Ambit Microsystems |manuf_model = EVW320B |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 01/06/2010 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Vietnam

|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Ubee C2104001 |rad1modif = Mini PCIe (half) |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43224;BCM43224KMLG; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |rad1n = 300/300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== *DOCSIS 3.0 Cable Modem with embedded MTA, router, :4x port switch and Wireless LAN access point :Dual band 802.11n Wireless LAN access point :8x downstream channels, 4x upstream channels :4x Gigabit Ethernet ports, 1x 2.0 USB ports :2x VoIP ports (RJ-11), NATP Router with Firewall
*DOCSIS 3.0 8x4 channels
{{See also|Ubee}} <!--"U10C076T91" and "REV.0 GP" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.-->
==Links of Interest== [https://ubeeinteractive.nl Ziggo ISP] (NL)
===Teardown=== *[https://electronics360.globalspec.com/article/3644/ubee-evw3200-cable-modem-teardown ''Ubee EVW3200 DOCSIS 3.0 Cable Modem'' Teardown on '''Electronics360'''] :CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM3380ZKFSBG - Cable Modem EuroDOCSIS 3.0 (8x4) :WLAN: [[Broadcom]] BCM43224KMLG - Half Mini PCIe Module (802.11abgn) :Switch: [[Broadcom]] BCM53114KFBG - GbE Switch (5-Port, 10/100/1000) :Flash: ''Macronix'' MX25L12845EMI-10G (NOR, 128Mb, 104MHz, SPI) :PSU: ''FEU'' DSA-24PFD-15 - AC Adapter 12V/2A (w/ 5ft cord)
[[Category:English Documentation]]
